metadata.title: CVE-2018-10058 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The remote management interface of cgminer 4.10.0 and bfgminer 5.5.0 allows an authenticated remote attacker to execute arbitrary code due to a stack-based buffer overflow in the addpool, failover-only, poolquota, and save command handlers.

criterions.comment: cgminer package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
